articles.author: Amy Peacock
articles.title: Asteroid City exhibition immerses visitors in Wes Anderson's film sets - Dezeen
articles.description: An exhibition of the sets, props, costumes and artwork used in Wes Anderson's latest film Asteroid City has opened at 180 The Strand in London.
articles.content:
An exhibition of the 1950s sets, props, miniature models, costumes and artwork used in Wes Anderson's latest film Asteroid City has opened at 180 The Strand in London.
The exhibition was designed to… [+3845 chars]
